text: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَيُدۡخِلُهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

translation.en: So as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, their Lord will admit them into His mercy. That is what is the clear attainment
translation.id: Adapun orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan, maka Tuhan memasukkan mereka ke dalam rahmat-Nya (surga). Demikian itulah kemenangan yang nyata
